name: openmailer
description: OpenMailer - Open source bulk email system with templates

scripts.build:js: mkdir -p src/main/resources/static/js/min && for file in src/main/resources/static/js/*.js; do terser "$file" -o "src/main/resources/static/js/min/$(basename "$file" .js).min.js" --compress --mangle; done
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:css:prod && npm run build:js
